metadata.dc:author: Braghetto, I
Montero, L
Montero, M
León, G
metadata.dc:description: Two patients consulting for upper gastrointestinal bleeding, associated to impaired gastric emptying in one, were studied with X rays and endoscopy. A gastric neurofibroma was confirmed by histologic study in both patients. One patient was submitted to subtotal gastrectomy. An endoscopic resection of the tumor was performed in the other.
metadata.dc:title: Neurofibroma gástrico. Comunicación de dos casos.
[Gastric neurofibroma. Report of 2 cases].
